body.name: LIGE Smart Watches for Android iOS, Bluetooth Calls/Text Remind/Voice Speaker, Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Sleep Monitor, 1.32'' HD Full Touch Screen, IP67 Waterproof Black Smartwatch for Men
features: 【Bluetooth Calls & Smart Notification】The newly upgraded LIGE smart watch equipped with powerful Bluetooth 5.0 and professional Communication chip, lt's time to free your hands, you can make and receive calls directly on the watch. Plus, your Facebook, Instagram, SMS, and email notifications sync to your watch, along with reminders, so you never miss important work calls and home messages again. you deserve to have!

【DIY Your Wallpaper & Personal Smart Assistant】5 styles of watch faces are built-in smart watch system. Setting your favorite photos as watch wallpaper until you are satisfied.Support the voice assistants, connected to Bluetooth,you don't need to take out your phone when driving or cooking, long press the voice assistant function on the watch to operate. You can also use the watch to set alarms, check the weather, take pictures, control music, find your phone. Smart era, fast and convenient.

【24 Hours Heart Rate & Sleep Monitor】LIGE smart watch supports dynamic and static heart rate monitoring, you can better understand the trend range of your heart rate value, as well as blood pressure and blood oxygen. Are you also curious about your sleep quality? Sleep trackers can record your deep/light/awake sleep status at night. This way you can rationalize your lifestyle. (The data is for reference only and cannot be used for medical purposes)

【IP67 Waterproof & Multiple Sports Modes】1.32'', 360*360 HD resolution, brings you visual spaciousness and comfort, 260mAh, 5-7 days of normal use, 30 days long standby battery. IP68 waterproof, hand washing and sweating are no problem. Mutiple sports mode have walking, running,rock climbing, playing ball and others.Recoring full-day your steps, miles, calories and sports data. Download the ''FitCloudPro'' App, connect to the Bluetooth of the mobile phone, and the data is clear.

【Perfect Compatibility & 24 Month Warranty Service】Our smart watch works with all models of mobile phones. LIGE smartwatches is very popular and makes the best gift for friends, colleagues and family. If it is a quality problem, we provide return and exchange service within 6 months, and a 24-month smart watch warranty service. In addition, if you have any confusion in the process of using the watch, please feel free to contact us and we will help you solve it.

Multifunctional smartwatch: - Message alert function - Take photo - Music control - Alarm clock - Sedentary reminder - Check weather - Drink reminder - Exercise timer - Blood pressure and oxygen sleep monitoring - Voice assistant Features provide convenience. If you want to give your boyfriend, husband, father or male colleague, this watch is one of the best gift options. LIGE's new smart watch-BW0327 is a combination of stainless steel strap and silicone strap, suitable for leisure, business, and sports styles, the strap is easy to replace, and it is luxurious to wear on various occasions. It is one of the best gift options.

LIGE BRAND STORY LIGE has 11 years of watchmaking experience, from research and development, design, production, quality inspection, sales and after-sales, every link is strictly treated. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well and looks great
reviews.reviewText: First off it's large and thick. It it taking some time to get use to, but I think that all will be OK.The screen is bright and looks good. There is a decent selection of downloadable face graphics available so it should be easy to find something that's easy to see and understand and/or meets your particular style.The various functions all seem to be relatively accurate; certainly not Health Care grade accuracy, but at least close enough so that you can use them as a basic guideline. The BP readings may be off a couple of numbers from calibrated medical equipment but you should be able to track your trends. Same w/ the accuracy of the number of steps, distances, calories burned, etc. Perhaps not 100% accuracy, but good enough for a general personal guideline.Once you figure them out, the menus aren't difficult to navigate and the APP is also easy to work and has effective functions available that aren't frustrating and useless. The Bluetooth connection to my iPhone seems to be strong and consistent. Text notifications have come through just fine but I haven't had the opportunity to use it for phone calls yet.Looks good and, in my opinion, worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My apologies for the late response but I am really enjoying this watch. I use the chain link arm band because it’s such a neat classic design that fits my wrist nicely. There are a lot of cool features and apps on the watch that make it very equipped for everyday situations. The two main applications I enjoy are the wrist calling and music control. The only thing that I do wish is to voice reply to text messages. If you at LIGE decide to add that feature to this brand I would gladly purchase another. Thank you for your assistance with this purchase and replacement. I enjoyed the emails I received as well give the sender my regards and a raise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price
reviews.reviewText: A decent somewhat stylish smart watch for the price. Two bands are included. The metal one includes a link removal tool and the clasp has never accidentally come open. I’ve turned all options on and my battery life is 2-3 days depending on how often I light it up. I also have the screen stay on for the max time. Your mileage may vary. All measurements are essentially based on algorithms that make well educated guesses that work well but can be influenced by your actions. If you keep your phone in your pocket, the step count will be more accurate than if you hold your phone flat in your hand for example. Most measurements are “relative” so only use them to give yourself an early heads up when there’s a change. Blood pressure seems fairly accurate as does the heartbeat monitor. The only issue that really annoyed me was how the watch face keeps changing without me wanting it too. The App is better than some I’ve seen but not up to par with, say, a Fitbit or Apple Watch but neither is its price point. And there’s no subscription fee for it either. I still use my Runkeeper to record my walks but the watch counts all your steps all day, not just my exercise periods. I like it for that. At $50 I’d say it’s about the right price point. I haven’t had it long enough to predict longevity but wouldn’t plan on giving it to an heir in your will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but charge cable broke on day 2
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch this week and so far it does everything I need it to do. The only issue is the charging cable broke on day 2. The prongs are spring loaded and one of the springs has moved or broke and now it won't charge the phone. Battery seems to last, it looks great and is light weight. A fully customizable watch face would be nice but wasn't a deal breaker for me. You can customize the wallpaper, but then you can only have the time and date displayed with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly work real well. Easy connection w bluetooth ... so far no issues. The weather /temperature data does lag a bit / inaccurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT work with Pixel 7A cellphone
reviews.reviewText: Hi Paul,Thanks for writing in!I understand your concern regarding using services on the LIGE smartwatch, and I also note that the watch is signaling for email alerts.Upon reviewing the details, I see that no watch has been activated on your account through the Google Fi device. As mentioned previously, only the Google Pixel Watch/Watch 2 or Samsung Galaxy Watch 5/Watch 6 are compatible with Google Fi. Therefore, if you are still referring to your LIGE smartwatch, it won't support Google Fi services.Given that the LIGE smartwatch is not compatible with Google Fi, we do not have information or a solution for the issue of the device signaling for email alerts. In this situation, I recommend reaching out to the carrier support from which you purchased the device. They should be able to assist you accordingly.Appreciate your understanding!If you have any further issues/questions, please feel free to reply or contact us over chat. We're here to support you 24/7.Thanks,PrathibhaGoogle Fi SupportThe following is what I sent Google.Please confirm that my settings are correct to send signals to a smartwatch.Please note that the phone is set to notify the watch for only PHONE and SMS. We receive ALL calls on the watch but only some SMS messages. The watch vibrates for calls and also for the few text messages it receives. However, the watch dings (bell) for email alerts even though the cellphone settings are NOT set to notify for emails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, comfortable and I really like the matte black finish.Great watch at a great price.
Ótimo produto,demora um pouco a chegar,mais gostei muito.
es práctico funcional elegante y cumple con lo que indican
